00038 static dfsch_object_t* native_cxr(void *baton, dfsch_object_t* args,
00039                                    dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00040   dfsch_object_t* pair;
00041   char* action = (char*) baton;
00042 
00043   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, pair);
00044   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00045 
00046   while(*action){
00047     if ((*action) == 'a'){
00048       pair = dfsch_car(pair);
00049     } else {
00050       pair = dfsch_cdr(pair);
00051     }
00052     action++;
00053   }
00054 
00055   return pair;
00056 }

00058 void dfsch__native_cxr_register(dfsch_object_t *ctx){
00059   int i;
00060 
00061   for (i=0; i < (sizeof(cxr_table)/sizeof(cxr_table[0])); i++){
00062     dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, cxr_table[i][0],
00063                      dfsch_make_primitive(&native_cxr,cxr_table[i][1]));
00064 
00065   }
00066 
00067 }
